title: UFC on ESPN 6: Official scorecards from Boston
text:
Check out the official scorecards from all 13 fights at UFC on ESPN 6 at TD Garden in Boston. (Gallery will be updated throughout the event.)

Tanner Boser def. Daniel Spitz

Brendan Allen def. Kevin Holland

Sean Brady def. Court McGee

Randy Costa def. Boston Salmon

Sean Woodson def. Kyle Bochniak

Molly McCann def. Diana Belbita

Charles Rosa def. Manny Bermudez

Darren Stewart def. Deron Winn

Maycee Barber def. Gillian Robertson Maycee Barber def. Gillian Robertson more

Joe Lauzon def. Jonathan Pearce
description: Check out the official scorecards from all 13 fights at UFC on ESPN 6.
